com.datasift.dropwizard.zookeeper.health

Class ZooKeeperHealthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
      • com.datasift.dropwizard.zookeeper.health.ZooKeeperHealthCheck

  • public class ZooKeeperHealthCheck
extends com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
    A HealthCheck for a ZooKeeper ensemble.

    Checks that:

    • the client is alive,
    • the client is connected to the cluster, and
    • the configured namespace exists

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZooKeeperHealthCheck

        public ZooKeeperHealthCheck(ZooKeeper client,
                    String quorumSpec,
                    String namespace,
                    String name)
        Creates a HealthCheck that checks the given ZooKeeper client is functioning correctly.
        Parameters:
        client - the client to check the health of.
        namespace - the namespace to check for within the ZooKeeper ensemble.
        name - the name of this HealthCheck.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        protected com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck.Result check()
                                                    throws Exception
        Checks that the configured ZooKeeper client is functioning correctly.
        Specified by:
        check in class com.yammer.metrics.core.HealthCheck
        Returns:
        Result#unhealthy(String) if the client is not functioning correctly or the connected ZooKeeper ensemble is not operating correctly; otherwise, Result#healthy().
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs checking the health of the ZooKeeper client.
